history.proof: intros T U F G Hfilter. unfold filterlim. sauto l: on depth: 3.

original: intros T U F G Hfilter. unfold filterlim. apply filter_filter'. apply Build_Filter. - apply filter_prod_ind with (P := fun _ => True); auto. - intros P Q HP HQ. apply filter_prod_ind with (P := P /\ Q); auto. intros Q' R' HQ' HR' x y HQR. destruct HQR as [HP HQ]. destruct HQR as [HR HQR]. split. + apply HP, HQ. + apply HQ', HR, HQR. - intros P Q HP Himp. apply filter_prod_ind with (P := Q); auto. intros Q' R HQ HR x y HQR. apply Himp, HQR.
